name: Calculate Hours for Configure XLS Net
action: <*ASSIGNVALUE(FDA XLS Network Configuration:[IF](<*ISSELECTED(FDA Implementation Methodology.Non-Standard Build Estimate)*>){[IF]([EQ](<*VALUE(FDA Panels Networked)*>,Yes)){<* Eval(2*<*VALUE(FDA Number of XLS Panels)*>) *>}{0}[ENDIF]}{[IF]([AND](<*ISSELECTED(FDA Implementation Methodology.Standard Build Estimate)*>,<*ISSELECTED(FDA GES Location.None)*>)){[IF]([EQ](<*VALUE(FDA Panels Networked)*>,Yes)){<* Eval(2*<*VALUE(FDA Number of XLS Panels)*>) *>}{0}[ENDIF]}{[IF]([AND](<*ISSELECTED(FDA Implementation Methodology.Standard Build Estimate)*>,[NEQ](<*VALUE(FDA GES Location)*>,None))){[IF]([EQ](<*VALUE(FDA Panels Networked)*>,Yes)){<* Eval(2*<*VALUE(FDA Number of XLS Panels)*>) *>}{0}[ENDIF]}{0}[ENDIF]}[ENDIF]}[ENDIF])*>
